mapper.insert:
insert into jingshen (WellName, company, PrimaryWellType, WellType, WellSection, HoleDiameter, StartTime, EndTime, StartDepth, StartVerticalDepth, EndDepth, EndVerticalDepth, CasingDiameter, SteelGrade, CasingSetDepth, CasingLength, CementReturnHeight, UpperCasingDiameter, UpperCasingSetDepth, DrillingFluidSystem, DrillingFluidDensity, PlasticViscosity, YieldValue, FormationPressure, status, num) values
#{item.wellName}, #{item.company}, #{item.primaryWellType}, #{item.wellType}, #{item.wellSection}, #{item.holeDiameter}, #{item.startTime}, #{item.endTime}, #{item.startDepth}, #{item.startVerticalDepth}, #{item.endDepth}, #{item.endVerticalDepth}, #{item.casingDiameter}, #{item.steelGrade}, #{item.casingSetDepth}, #{item.casingLength}, #{item.cementReturnHeight}, #{item.upperCasingDiameter}, #{item.upperCasingSetDepth}, #{item.drillingFluidSystem}, #{item.drillingFluidDensity}, #{item.plasticViscosity}, #{item.yieldValue}, #{item.formationPressure}, #{item.status}, #{item.num}

insert into jibenxinxi (wellName, company, oilFieldName, oilFieldCode, isCooperative, contractor, primaryWellType, secondaryWellType, tertiaryWellType, wellType, waterDepth1, designDepth, designVerticalDepth, designDate, structureName, uniqueWellId, chineseWellName, operator, hydrocarbonType, riskLevel, riskType, riskGrade, sulfurGrade, containsCO2, zeroDepth, initialKellyElevation, groundElevation, currentKellyElevation, casingHeadElevation, waterDepth2, mudLineElevation, artificialBottomDepth, drillingDays, positioningMethod, location, geodeticSystem, longitude, latitude, xcoordinate, ycoordinate, slotNumber, country, region, province, county, scrapedWell, officePhone, remark, status, num) values
#{item.wellName}, #{item.company}, #{item.oilFieldName}, #{item.oilFieldCode}, #{item.isCooperative}, #{item.contractor}, #{item.primaryWellType}, #{item.secondaryWellType}, #{item.tertiaryWellType}, #{item.wellType}, #{item.waterDepth1}, #{item.designDepth}, #{item.designVerticalDepth}, #{item.designDate}, #{item.structureName}, #{item.uniqueWellId}, #{item.chineseWellName}, #{item.operator}, #{item.hydrocarbonType}, #{item.riskLevel}, #{item.riskType}, #{item.riskGrade}, #{item.sulfurGrade}, #{item.containsCO2}, #{item.zeroDepth}, #{item.initialKellyElevation}, #{item.groundElevation}, #{item.currentKellyElevation}, #{item.casingHeadElevation}, #{item.waterDepth2}, #{item.mudLineElevation}, #{item.artificialBottomDepth}, #{item.drillingDays}, #{item.positioningMethod}, #{item.location}, #{item.geodeticSystem}, #{item.longitude}, #{item.latitude}, #{item.xcoordinate}, #{item.ycoordinate}, #{item.slotNumber}, #{item.country}, #{item.region}, #{item.province}, #{item.county}, #{item.scrapedWell}, #{item.officePhone}, #{item.remark}, #{item.status}, #{item.num}

insert into fuza (wellName, company, primaryWellType, wellType, startTime, endTime, durationHours, firstLevelCode, secondLevelCode, thirdLevelCode, fourthLevelCode, complexityType, wellSection, startDepth, endDepth, operationDescription, status, num) values
#{item.wellName}, #{item.company}, #{item.primaryWellType}, #{item.wellType}, #{item.startTime}, #{item.endTime}, #{item.durationHours}, #{item.firstLevelCode}, #{item.secondLevelCode}, #{item.thirdLevelCode}, #{item.fourthLevelCode}, #{item.complexityType}, #{item.wellSection}, #{item.startDepth}, #{item.endDepth}, #{item.operationDescription}, #{item.status}, #{item.num}

insert into zuantou (wellName, company, primaryWellType, wellType, drillBitNumber, drillBitType, sizeIn, manufacturer, model, serialNumber, nozzleSize, drillBitTFAn2, entryDepth, exitDepth, entryTime, exitTime, advanceDistance, pureDrillingTime, rop, maxDrillingPressure, minDrillingPressure, maxRotationSpeed, minRotationSpeed, iadcWearEvaluation, encounteredFormation, status, num) values
#{item.wellName}, #{item.company}, #{item.primaryWellType}, #{item.wellType}, #{item.drillBitNumber}, #{item.drillBitType}, #{item.sizeIn}, #{item.manufacturer}, #{item.model}, #{item.serialNumber}, #{item.nozzleSize}, #{item.drillBitTFAn2}, #{item.entryDepth}, #{item.exitDepth}, #{item.entryTime}, #{item.exitTime}, #{item.advanceDistance}, #{item.pureDrillingTime}, #{item.rop}, #{item.maxDrillingPressure}, #{item.minDrillingPressure}, #{item.maxRotationSpeed}, #{item.minRotationSpeed}, #{item.iadcWearEvaluation}, #{item.encounteredFormation}, #{item.status}, #{item.num}

insert into jingshen (WellName, company, PrimaryWellType, WellType, WellSection, HoleDiameter, StartTime, EndTime, StartDepth, StartVerticalDepth, EndDepth, EndVerticalDepth, CasingDiameter, SteelGrade, CasingSetDepth, CasingLength, CementReturnHeight, UpperCasingDiameter, UpperCasingSetDepth, DrillingFluidSystem, DrillingFluidDensity, PlasticViscosity, YieldValue, FormationPressure, status, num) values
#{item.wellName}, #{item.company}, #{item.primaryWellType}, #{item.wellType}, #{item.wellSection}, #{item.holeDiameter}, #{item.startTime}, #{item.endTime}, #{item.startDepth}, #{item.startVerticalDepth}, #{item.endDepth}, #{item.endVerticalDepth}, #{item.casingDiameter}, #{item.steelGrade}, #{item.casingSetDepth}, #{item.casingLength}, #{item.cementReturnHeight}, #{item.upperCasingDiameter}, #{item.upperCasingSetDepth}, #{item.drillingFluidSystem}, #{item.drillingFluidDensity}, #{item.plasticViscosity}, #{item.yieldValue}, #{item.formationPressure}, #{item.status}, #{item.num}

insert into jibenxinxi (wellName, company, oilFieldName, oilFieldCode, isCooperative, contractor, primaryWellType, secondaryWellType, tertiaryWellType, wellType, waterDepth1, designDepth, designVerticalDepth, designDate, structureName, uniqueWellId, chineseWellName, operator, hydrocarbonType, riskLevel, riskType, riskGrade, sulfurGrade, containsCO2, zeroDepth, initialKellyElevation, groundElevation, currentKellyElevation, casingHeadElevation, waterDepth2, mudLineElevation, artificialBottomDepth, drillingDays, positioningMethod, location, geodeticSystem, longitude, latitude, xcoordinate, ycoordinate, slotNumber, country, region, province, county, scrapedWell, officePhone, remark, status, num) values
#{item.wellName}, #{item.company}, #{item.oilFieldName}, #{item.oilFieldCode}, #{item.isCooperative}, #{item.contractor}, #{item.primaryWellType}, #{item.secondaryWellType}, #{item.tertiaryWellType}, #{item.wellType}, #{item.waterDepth1}, #{item.designDepth}, #{item.designVerticalDepth}, #{item.designDate}, #{item.structureName}, #{item.uniqueWellId}, #{item.chineseWellName}, #{item.operator}, #{item.hydrocarbonType}, #{item.riskLevel}, #{item.riskType}, #{item.riskGrade}, #{item.sulfurGrade}, #{item.containsCO2}, #{item.zeroDepth}, #{item.initialKellyElevation}, #{item.groundElevation}, #{item.currentKellyElevation}, #{item.casingHeadElevation}, #{item.waterDepth2}, #{item.mudLineElevation}, #{item.artificialBottomDepth}, #{item.drillingDays}, #{item.positioningMethod}, #{item.location}, #{item.geodeticSystem}, #{item.longitude}, #{item.latitude}, #{item.xcoordinate}, #{item.ycoordinate}, #{item.slotNumber}, #{item.country}, #{item.region}, #{item.province}, #{item.county}, #{item.scrapedWell}, #{item.officePhone}, #{item.remark}, #{item.status}, #{item.num}
mapper.select:
select * from jingshen
AND wellName like '%${wellName}%'
AND company like '%${company}%'
AND primaryWellType like '%${primaryWellType}%'
AND wellType like '%${wellType}%'
AND wellSection like '%${wellSection}%'
AND holeDiameter like '%${holeDiameter}%'
AND startTime like '%${startTime}%'
AND endTime like '%${endTime}%'
AND startDepth like '%${startDepth}%'
AND startVerticalDepth like '%${startVerticalDepth}%'
AND endDepth like '%${endDepth}%'
AND endVerticalDepth like '%${endVerticalDepth}%'
AND casingDiameter like '%${casingDiameter}%'
AND steelGrade like '%${steelGrade}%'
AND casingSetDepth like '%${casingSetDepth}%'
AND casingLength like '%${casingLength}%'
AND cementReturnHeight like '%${cementReturnHeight}%'
AND upperCasingDiameter like '%${upperCasingDiameter}%'
AND upperCasingSetDepth like '%${upperCasingSetDepth}%'
AND drillingFluidSystem like '%${drillingFluidSystem}%'
AND drillingFluidDensity like '%${drillingFluidDensity}%'
AND plasticViscosity like '%${plasticViscosity}%'
AND yieldValue like '%${yieldValue}%'
AND formationPressure like '%${formationPressure}%'
AND status = 1
order by OnlyKey desc

select * from jibenxinxi
AND wellName LIKE '%${wellName}%'
AND company LIKE '%${company}%'
AND oilFieldName LIKE '%${oilFieldName}%'
AND oilFieldCode LIKE '%${oilFieldCode}%'
AND isCooperative LIKE '%${isCooperative}%'
AND contractor LIKE '%${contractor}%'
AND primaryWellType LIKE '%${primaryWellType}%'
AND secondaryWellType LIKE '%${secondaryWellType}%'
AND tertiaryWellType LIKE '%${tertiaryWellType}%'
AND wellType LIKE '%${wellType}%'
AND waterDepth1 LIKE '%${waterDepth1}%'
AND designDepth LIKE '%${designDepth}%'
AND designVerticalDepth LIKE '%${designVerticalDepth}%'
AND designDate LIKE '%${designDate}%'
AND structureName LIKE '%${structureName}%'
AND uniqueWellId LIKE '%${uniqueWellId}%'
AND chineseWellName LIKE '%${chineseWellName}%'
AND operator LIKE '%${operator}%'
AND hydrocarbonType LIKE '%${hydrocarbonType}%'
AND riskLevel LIKE '%${riskLevel}%'
AND riskType LIKE '%${riskType}%'
AND riskGrade LIKE '%${riskGrade}%'
AND sulfurGrade LIKE '%${sulfurGrade}%'
AND containsCO2 LIKE '%${containsCO2}%'
AND zeroDepth LIKE '%${zeroDepth}%'
AND initialKellyElevation LIKE '%${initialKellyElevation}%'
AND groundElevation LIKE '%${groundElevation}%'
AND currentKellyElevation LIKE '%${currentKellyElevation}%'
AND casingHeadElevation LIKE '%${casingHeadElevation}%'
AND waterDepth2 LIKE '%${waterDepth2}%'
AND mudLineElevation LIKE '%${mudLineElevation}%'
AND artificialBottomDepth LIKE '%${artificialBottomDepth}%'
AND drillingDays LIKE '%${drillingDays}%'
AND positioningMethod LIKE '%${positioningMethod}%'
AND location LIKE '%${location}%'
AND geodeticSystem LIKE '%${geodeticSystem}%'
AND longitude LIKE '%${longitude}%'
AND latitude LIKE '%${latitude}%'
AND xcoordinate LIKE '%${xcoordinate}%'
AND ycoordinate LIKE '%${ycoordinate}%'
AND slotNumber LIKE '%${slotNumber}%'
AND country LIKE '%${country}%'
AND region LIKE '%${region}%'
AND province LIKE '%${province}%'
AND county LIKE '%${county}%'
AND scrapedWell LIKE '%${scrapedWell}%'
AND officePhone LIKE '%${officePhone}%'
AND remark LIKE '%${remark}%'
AND status = 1
order by onlyKey desc

select * from fuza
AND wellName LIKE '%${wellName}%'
AND company LIKE '%${company}%'
AND primaryWellType LIKE '%${primaryWellType}%'
AND wellType LIKE '%${wellType}%'
AND startTime LIKE '%${startTime}%'
AND endTime LIKE '%${endTime}%'
AND durationHours LIKE '%${durationHours}%'
AND firstLevelCode LIKE '%${firstLevelCode}%'
AND secondLevelCode LIKE '%${secondLevelCode}%'
AND thirdLevelCode LIKE '%${thirdLevelCode}%'
AND fourthLevelCode LIKE '%${fourthLevelCode}%'
AND complexityType LIKE '%${complexityType}%'
AND wellSection LIKE '%${wellSection}%'
AND startDepth LIKE '%${startDepth}%'
AND endDepth LIKE '%${endDepth}%'
AND operationDescription LIKE '%${operationDescription}%'
AND status = 1
order by OnlyKey desc

select * from zuantou
AND wellName LIKE '%${wellName}%'
AND company LIKE '%${company}%'
AND primaryWellType LIKE '%${primaryWellType}%'
AND wellType LIKE '%${wellType}%'
AND drillBitNumber LIKE '%${drillBitNumber}%'
AND drillBitType LIKE '%${drillBitType}%'
AND sizeIn LIKE '%${sizeIn}%'
AND manufacturer LIKE '%${manufacturer}%'
AND model LIKE '%${model}%'
AND serialNumber LIKE '%${serialNumber}%'
AND nozzleSize LIKE '%${nozzleSize}%'
AND drillBitTFAn2 LIKE '%${drillBitTFAn2}%'
AND entryDepth LIKE '%${entryDepth}%'
AND exitDepth LIKE '%${exitDepth}%'
AND entryTime LIKE '%${entryTime}%'
AND exitTime LIKE '%${exitTime}%'
AND advanceDistance LIKE '%${advanceDistance}%'
AND pureDrillingTime LIKE '%${pureDrillingTime}%'
AND rop LIKE '%${rop}%'
AND maxDrillingPressure LIKE '%${maxDrillingPressure}%'
AND minDrillingPressure LIKE '%${minDrillingPressure}%'
AND maxRotationSpeed LIKE '%${maxRotationSpeed}%'
AND minRotationSpeed LIKE '%${minRotationSpeed}%'
AND iadcWearEvaluation LIKE '%${iadcWearEvaluation}%'
AND encounteredFormation LIKE '%${encounteredFormation}%'
AND status = 1
order by OnlyKey desc
mapper.update: update jingshen set status = 0 where OnlyKey = #{OnlyKey} AND status = 1
update jibenxinxi set status = 0 WHERE OnlyKey = #{OnlyKey} AND status = 1
update fuza set status = 0 where OnlyKey = #{OnlyKey} AND status = 1
update zuantou set status = 0 where OnlyKey = #{OnlyKey} AND status = 1

update jingshen
WellName = #{WellName},
company = #{company},
PrimaryWellType = #{PrimaryWellType},
WellType = #{WellType},
WellSection = #{WellSection},
HoleDiameter = #{HoleDiameter},
StartTime = #{StartTime},
EndTime = #{EndTime},
StartDepth = #{StartDepth},
StartVerticalDepth = #{StartVerticalDepth},
EndDepth = #{EndDepth},
EndVerticalDepth = #{EndVerticalDepth},
CasingDiameter = #{CasingDiameter},
SteelGrade = #{SteelGrade},
CasingSetDepth = #{CasingSetDepth},
CasingLength = #{CasingLength},
CementReturnHeight = #{CementReturnHeight},
UpperCasingDiameter = #{UpperCasingDiameter},
UpperCasingSetDepth = #{UpperCasingSetDepth},
DrillingFluidSystem = #{DrillingFluidSystem},
DrillingFluidDensity = #{DrillingFluidDensity},
PlasticViscosity = #{PlasticViscosity},
YieldValue = #{YieldValue},
FormationPressure = #{FormationPressure}
where OnlyKey = #{OnlyKey}
